front.title: A Profile for AS Adjacency Attestation Objects

abstract.t: This document describes a profile for AS Adjacency AttestationObjects (AAOs). An AAO is a digitally signed object that provides ameans of verifying that an AS holder has made an attestation that ithas a inter-domain routing adjacency with one or more other AS's,with the associated inference that this AS is prepared to announce orreceive routes with these adjacent AS's in the inter-domain domainenvironment.
